name.jp: 希望のマント（取引不可）
name.vi: Áo choàng hy vọng (Không buôn bán)

description.en: Dedicated to the victims of the disaster in Japan, which occurred on March 11th 2011. All Proceeds from sales of this item in the Flyff Item Shop will be donated to help the victims of this crisis.
description.ar: Dedicated to the victims of the disaster in Japan, which occurred on March 11th 2011. All Proceeds from sales of this item in the Flyff Item Shop will be donated to help the victims of this crisis.
description.br: Dedicado às vítimas de um desastre no Japão, que ocorreu no dia 11 de Março de 2011. Todos os rendimentos das vendas deste item na Loja de Itens Flyff serão doados para ajudar as vítimas desta crise.
description.cns: 纪念 2011 年 3 月 11 日发生在日本的灾难中的受害者。在 Flyff 商品商店销售此商品的所有收益将捐赠给帮助这场危机的受害者。
description.de: Zeige Solidarität mit dem japanischen Volk und spende etwas Hoffnung.
description.fi: Dedicated to the victims of the disaster in Japan, which occurred on March 11th 2011. All Proceeds from sales of this item in the Flyff Item Shop will be donated to help the victims of this crisis.
description.fil: Dedicated to the victims of the disaster in Japan, which occurred on March 11th 2011. All Proceeds from sales of this item in the Flyff Item Shop will be donated to help the victims of this crisis.
description.fr: Affichez votre soutien pour les souffrances du peuple japonais.
description.id: Didedikasikan untuk para korban bencana di Jepang yang terjadi pada 11 Maret 2011. Seluruh hasil penjualan item ini di Flyff Item Shop akan disumbangkan untuk membantu para korban krisis ini.
description.it: Dedicated to the victims of the disaster in Japan, which occurred on March 11th 2011. All Proceeds from sales of this item in the Flyff Item Shop will be donated to help the victims of this crisis.
description.jp: 希望は強い勇気であり、あらたな意志である。.
description.nl: Dedicated to the victims of the disaster in Japan, which occurred on March 11th 2011. All Proceeds from sales of this item in the Flyff Item Shop will be donated to help the victims of this crisis.
description.pl: Dedicated to the victims of the disaster in Japan, which occurred on March 11th 2011. All Proceeds from sales of this item in the Flyff Item Shop will be donated to help the victims of this crisis.
description.ru: В память о погибших при землетрясении и цунами в Японии 11 марта 2011 года.
description.sp: Dedicado a las víctimas del desastre en Japón que ocurrió el 11 de marzo de 2011. Todas las ganancias de las ventas de este objeto en la Tienda de Flyff se donarán para ayudar a las víctimas de esta crisis.
description.sw: Dedicated to the victims of the disaster in Japan, which occurred on March 11th 2011. All Proceeds from sales of this item in the Flyff Item Shop will be donated to help the victims of this crisis.
description.th: อุทิศให้กับผู้ประสบภัยในญี่ปุ่นซึ่งเกิดขึ้นเมื่อวันที่ 11 มีนาคม 2554 รายได้ทั้งหมดจากการขายสินค้านี้ในร้านค้า Flyff Item Shop จะนำไปบริจาคเพื่อช่วยเหลือผู้ประสบภัยจากวิกฤตครั้งนี้
description.tw: 可以給予遭遇困難的人希望。
description.vi: Dành riêng cho các nạn nhân của thảm họa ở Nhật Bản, xảy ra vào ngày 11 tháng 3 năm 2011. Tất cả tiền thu được từ việc bán mặt hàng này trong Flyff Item Shop sẽ được quyên góp để giúp đỡ các nạn nhân của cuộc khủng hoảng này.
